ygData.subject: Re: Re: Optional locations
ygData.msgSnippet: wow those were very cool screenshots I want a flying machine where i can pass over mobs and drop gnomish bombs and use my gnomish gun to POW em! Hold onto this
ygData.messageBody:
wow
those were very cool screenshots
I want a flying machine where i can pass over mobs and drop gnomish bombs and
use my gnomish gun to POW em!
Hold onto this idea fellow gnomes, even if there is no 3rd book, even if
tinkering now sux and costs a million dollars! One day and 10 patches later
everyone might want to be a gnome and we will already have maxxed skill and
be the 1sts to use it! BTW what is the origin of those ss? im interested as
well, that flying machine was just TITS! And it only seems natural that we
get to build a flying machine, gnomes in other games get flying machines.
Still psyched
Dwizz Singez
27 mage and leveling fast
Tribunal
